# Iris Dataset

```{r}
data(iris)
```

```{r}
head(iris)[,1:4]
nrow(iris)

iris.data <- iris[,1:4]
iris.scaled <- scale(iris.data)
```

## k-nn

```{r}
library(e1071)
library(caTools)
library(class)
```

```{r}
classifier_knn <- knn(train = iris.scaled,
                      test = iris.scaled,
                      cl = iris$Species,
                      k = 13)
classifier_knn
```

```{r}
cm <- table(iris$Species, classifier_knn)
cm
```

```{r}
(150-5)/150
```

## k-means Clustering

```{r}
library(ClusterR)
library(cluster)
```

```{r}
set.seed(47)
kmeans.re <- kmeans(iris.scaled, centers = 3, nstart = 40)
```

```{r}
# Cluster identification for 
# each observation
kmeans.re$cluster
  
# Confusion Matrix
cm <- table(iris$Species, kmeans.re$cluster)
cm
```

## Hierarchical Clustering

```{r}
distance_mat <- dist(iris.scaled, method = 'euclidean')
```

```{r}
set.seed(47)
Hierar_cl <- hclust(distance_mat, method = "")
fit <- cutree(Hierar_cl, k = 3)
cm <- table(iris$Species, fit)
cm
```

## DQFs

```{r}
# dqf.scaled <- dqf.subset(iris.scaled,subsample=nrow(iris.scaled))
# saveRDS(dqf.scaled,"./RDS Files/20a01. Scaled Iris dqf-subset")
dqf.s <- readRDS("./RDS Files/20a01. Scaled Iris dqf-subset")
```

```{r}
subset <- c(51:55,101:150)
dqf1 <- extract.dqfs(dqf.scaled,subset)

subset <- c(51:100)
dqf2 <- extract.dqfs(dqf.scaled,subset)
```

```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
plot.dqf(dqf1,labels=show(length(subset),1:5),main="5 2s vs 3s")
plot.dqf(dqf2,labels=show(length(subset),1:5),main="2 only")
```
